Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
11/30 3PM - Dont you just love a good snowy Sunday? As of this afternoon, we saw 1 inch of new snowfall with flurries continuing on this evening. We are getting excited for Tuesday with 6+ inches forecasted meaning free refills all day! Be sure to keep an eye on the radar and start those snow dances! Tomorrow we plan on having 5 ways up including the Gondola, American Express, Ursa Express, Snow Bowl Express, and Theodore Carpet with the possibility of wind delays. Youll find 17 ways down including the new addition of Upper Spruce and Lower Spruce. Both are expected to come online late morning! All 17 trails are set to receive those overnight stripes you all know and love.

Cold temperatures will hold through the coming week, giving our snowmaking team a solid window to push for terrain expansion. Stay tuned to the Mountain Report for the most up-to-date information.

For those of you who cant wait for the parks to open, check out the lower portion of Frank's Fall Line! Our Parks crew has set a 3 feature pop-up park, including 2 boxes and 1 tube, ready to hold you over while they eye their next build.

See you bright and early for your morning update! 


Safety Tip: If you carry a phone while on the mountain, ensure your children and loved ones have your number memorized.

Uphill travel is open! You must get a pass from guest services and read the policy online. Please keep in mind that there are designated travel routes with or without snow.

Don't know when you're going to go? The Stratton Summit Saver is a flexible preloaded lift ticket, with your choice of 2, 3, or 4 tickets. The Summit Saver lets you go right to the lift and ride on your schedule, with pre-purchased, pre-loaded lift tickets on this RFID Pass. Did we mention NO blackout dates? Grab the Summit Saver starting at just $248 for adults and $196 for youth.

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability!
